rules.name: True_CRF_1_Completed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10) AND (11 OR 12 OR 13)
rules.label: True CRF 1 Completed

rules.name: True_CRF_1_Not_Completed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND 6 AND (7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10) AND (11 OR 12 OR 13)
rules.label: True CRF 1 Not Completed

rules.name: True_CRF_2_Not_Completed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND (4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7)
rules.label: True CRF 2 Not Completed

rules.name: True_CRF_3_Not_Completed
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND (4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: True CRF 3 Not Completed
